data.question: What is the empirical formula of the heteroleptic two-coordinate FeI complex synthesized?
At what temperature were the X-ray diffraction experiments for compound 1 carried out?
What method was used for absorption correction in the X-ray diffraction experiment of compound 5?
What is the crystal system of compound 6?
What is the final R index (I>2sigma(I)) for the (IPr)Cl-Fe[N(SiMe3)DIPP] compound?
What is the density (calculated) of compound 5?
How does the isomer shift in the Mössbauer spectrum of compound 1 at 5 K compare to that of compound 5?
data.answer: The isomer shift of compound 1 is 0.39 mm/s, which is lower than the 0.81 mm/s of compound 5, indicating a reduction at the iron center for compound 5.

data.question: What change in color is observed when NEt3·HCl is added to the solution of Fe[N(SiMe3)DIPP]2 during the synthesis of (IPr)Cl-Fe[N(SiMe3)DIPP]?
data.answer: The solution changes from light yellow to tan.
